div.span: The WJHSD and all K-12 schools in the state of PA will be closed beginning Monday, March 16 throughout the remainder of the school year with online instruction beginning on Monday, March 30, 2020. Please visit the

div.span: The WJHSD strives to provide accurate and continuous communication during this rapidly-evolving COVID-19 pandemic.
Please check this website often as it will be updated often with important news and information.

br.span: WJHSD is committed to making its website accessible to the widest possible audience, including individuals with disabilities. Should any user have difficulty accessing the content of this site, please call 412-655-8450 x2233 for assistance. Thank you.
